text:
http://500px.com, Toronto

500px is a photo community for premium photography. Check out http://500px.com/popular

We are looking for:

1. Senior Android Developers to help us build apps for Android based devices such as cameras, smartphones and TVs

2. Senior Web Developers to help us with scalability issues, API, new features and chinese spammers

What we offer:

  - competitive salaries
  - flexible work hours
  - unlimited vacation
  - free lunches
  - medical insurance
  - any computer/laptop
Apply here:

http://500px.theresumator.com/apply/YiIWfi/Senior-Android-De...

http://500px.theresumator.com/apply/N9l8cp/Senior-Web-Develo...

http://500px.com/jobs
